SELECT pl.id AS id, pl.start_no AS startNo, p.nick AS nick, pl.luck AS luck, pl.luck_start AS luckStart, pl.luck_end AS luckEnd, pl.luck_count AS luckCount, pl.luck_remain AS luckRemain, pl.luck_status AS luckStatus, pl.user_id AS userId, u.name AS userName, pl.create_time AS createTime FROM player_luck pl LEFT JOIN player p ON pl.start_no = p.start_no LEFT JOIN user u ON pl.user_id = u.id
pl.luck_status = 1
and p.start_no like concat(concat('%',#{startNo}),'%')
GROUP BY pl.id
